name: Qkart
description: A web-application that allows users to search, browse, and add products to cart from various providers, providing a convenient and efficient shopping experience.

name: Tic Tac Toe Game
description: A Tic Tac Toe game designed for simple, pass-and-play fun. Users can seamlessly take turns with friends, enjoying a classic game of strategy in a straightforward and accessible format.

name: 3D Portfolio
description: An immersive 3D portfolio built with Three.js and React, where I showcase my web development skills and creative projects. Discover a dynamic presentation of my professional journey and expertise.

name: Qtrip
description: A travel website where users can browse the various Adventures on offer, based on their places of interest and book an Adventure with us.

name: Xboard
description: A News Feed website that will feature the latest news for select topics, from Flipboard a News Feed website aggregator which aggregates news content from different websites in one place.

name: Signature App
description: A video sharing platform which will host videos for the world to watch. It also feature uploading new videos by using external video links (eg: Youtube) and displaying video fetched from the link.

name: Geektrust - Admin UI Challenge
description: An admin panel ui made with React and Bootstrap with pagination and search functionality to add, delete or edit user details.
